name: discover cultural artifacts
notification: We have discovered cultural artifacts in the camp! (+[cultureAmount] culture)

name: squatters willing to work for you
squatters wishing to settle under your rule
uniques: Free [Civilian Convoy] found in the ruins

name: your exploring unit receives training
notification: The survivors trained us in their ways of combat!

name: survivors (adds population to a city)
notification: We have found survivors in the camp! Population added to [cityName].

name: a stash of water
notification: We have found a stash of [goldAmount] water in the camp!

name: discover a lost technology
notification: We have discovered the lost technology of [techName] in the camp!
uniques: [1] free random researchable Tech(s) from the [Decivilized era]

name: advanced weaponry for your explorer
notification: Our unit finds advanced weaponry hidden in the camp!
uniques: This Unit upgrades for free including special upgrades <starting from the [Neofeudal era]>

name: reveal nearby Barbarian camps
notification: You find evidence of Barbarian activity. Nearby Barbarian camps are revealed!
uniques: Reveal up to [All] [Barbarian encampment] within a [10] tile radius

name: find a crudely-drawn map
notification: The camp contains maps of the nearby area!
uniques: Reveal up to [All] [All] within a [5] tile radius

name: discover religious texts
notification: We have found religious texts in the camp, giving us a deeper understanding of religion! (+[faithAmount] Faith)
uniques: Gain enough Faith for a Pantheon <after [15] turns>

name: an ancient prophecy
notification: We have found an ancient prophecy in the camp, greatly increasing our spiritual connection! (+[faithAmount] Faith)
uniques: Gain enough Faith for [33]% of a Great Prophet <after [15] turns>
